ModMetaData.name: [Medieval]Dead Can Serve (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: CapatinSnafu
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of CapatinSnafus mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1776511809
- Replaced the whole thing with patches that just removes all modern stuff. The mod now requires that [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2548091455]Dead Can Serve (Continued)[/url] is loaded before it
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/MedievalDeadCanServe][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/h5VwTNL.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] A Medieval Version for My Mod [Dead Can Serve]. Have removed all the modern or advanced techs of the original mod and make a little adjustment. So medieval mod player can utilize corpse without something they can't use.
[strike][h1]Imcompatible with [Dead Can Serve].[/h1][/strike]
Things contain below:
CorpseFertilizer (made in butcher table) BloodSoil AntisepticCorpse (made in butcher table) PlanterCoffin Crucifix MaggotsBreeder LargeMaggots
Check the description and screenshots in the complete version. [h1]If you're not a medieval mod player, i recommend you to use the complete version:[/h1]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2018891555
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
